Play Bomberman Tournament GBA Online – Action and Puzzle Adventure

Bomberman Tournament combines classic Bomberman gameplay with RPG elements and multiplayer battles on the Game Boy Advance. Players travel across Phantarion, solving puzzles, defeating enemies, and using collectible Carabon creatures with unique abilities to advance.

What is Bomberman Tournament?

Bomberman Tournament is a 2001 action-adventure game for GBA that features two modes: a single-player Quest mode and a multiplayer Battle mode. In Quest mode, Bomberman explores dungeons, collects Carabon creatures, and rescues his friend Max. In Battle mode, up to four players can compete in classic Bomberman maze challenges using link cables.

How to Play Bomberman Tournament

  • Navigate Mazes: Use bombs to defeat enemies, break obstacles, and solve puzzles.
  • Collect Carabon: Capture creatures with special abilities to aid your progress.
  • Complete Quests: Rescue Max and advance through the story-driven Quest mode.
  • Multiplayer Battles: Compete in classic Bomberman battles with up to four players.
  • Strategic Bombing: Plan bomb placements to defeat enemies and unlock pathways.
